column1: Kata Robata////One of the defining and quintessential dining experiencing in Houston. By far one of my favorite date spots in Houston
column2: they offer a quaint experience with a varied menu and wide array of options. Their sushi is the phenomenal
column3: and their own creations are wonderful as well. What makes kata stand out above the rest are its other untraditional offerings
column6: kobe beef skewers etc are unbelievable. Yes it does cost a pretty penny
column7: but its a penny well spent. I will continue to go to kata for my Japanese fix.
